contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox football biography | name = Xabier Etxeita | image = | fullname = Xabier Etxeita Gorritxategi | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1987|10|31|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Zornotza]], [[Spain]] | height = {{height|m=1.85}} | position = [[Defender (association football)|Defender]] | currentclub = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | clubnumber = TBA | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = [[SD Amorebieta|Amorebieta]] | years1 = 2005–2006 | clubs1 = [[SD Amorebieta|Amorebieta]] | caps1 = | goals1 = | years2 = 2006–2009 | clubs2 = [[Bilbao Athletic]] | caps2 = 66 | goals2 = 7 | years3 = 2008–2010 | clubs3 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | caps3 = 17 | goals3 = 1 | years4 = 2010 | clubs4 = → [[FC Cartagena|Cartagena]] (loan) | caps4 = 14 | goals4 = 1 | years5 = 2010–2013 | clubs5 = [[Elche CF|Elche]] | caps5 = 96 | goals5 = 5 | years6 = 2013– | clubs6 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | caps6 = 0 | goals6 = 0 | pcupdate = 1 June 2013 }} {{Spanish name|Etxeita|Gorritxategi}} '''Xabier Etxeita Gorritxategi''' (born 31 October 1987 in [[Zornotza]], [[Biscay]]) is a [[Spain|Spanish]] professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays for [[Athletic Bilbao]] mainly as a [[Defender (association football)#Centre back|central defender]]. ==Football career== A product of [[Athletic Bilbao|Athletic de Bilbao]]'s prolific youth ranks, [[Lezama]], Etxeita's first three games with the first team, in [[2008–09 La Liga|2008–09]]'s [[La Liga]], were not without incidents: in his first, a 2–0 home win against neighbours [[CA Osasuna]] on 16 November 2008,<ref>[http://www.athletic-club.net/web/main.asp?a=1&b=3&c=0&d=1&id=3893&idi=2 Athletic 2 – Osasuna 0]; Athletic's official website, 16 November 2008</ref> he [[Substitute (association football)|subbed in]] for injured [[Ustaritz Aldekoaotalora|Ustaritz]], being [[Ejection (sports)|sent off]] in the following against [[CD Numancia]] (same venue and result).<ref>[http://www.athletic-club.net/web/main.asp?a=1&b=3&c=0&d=1&id=3895&idi=2 Athletic 2 – Numancia 0]; Athletic's official website, 30 November 2008</ref> On 21 December Etxeita replaced [[Ander Murillo]], who also retired before [[half-time]] due to injury, in a 1–0 success at [[Real Betis]].<ref>[http://www.athletic-club.net/web/main.asp?a=1&b=3&c=0&d=1&id=3898&idi=2 Betis 0 – Athletic 1]; Athletic's official website, 21 December 2008</ref> During the season, however, he was mainly registered with [[Bilbao Athletic|the B-side]]. In the very last days of the 2010 January [[transfer window]] Etxeita moved on a five-month loan to [[FC Cartagena]], in the [[Segunda División|second division]].<ref>[http://www.marca.com/2010/01/26/futbol/equipos/cartagena/1264546793.html El Cartegena cierra la cesión de Etxeita (Cartegena closes Etxeita loan)]; [[Marca (newspaper)|Marca]], 26 January 2010 {{es icon}}</ref> On 16 July 2010 he left Athletic and signed with another side in that level, [[Elche CF]], quickly going on to establish himself in the starting XI. On 4 June 2013, after contributing with 40 games and four goals as the [[Valencian Community]] club [[2012–13 Segunda División|returned to the top level]] after more than 20 years, Etxeita returned to Athletic Bilbao on a [[Free transfer (association football)|free transfer]].<ref>[http://www.deia.com/2013/06/04/athletic/el-elche-confirma-que-el-central-etxeita-regresa-al-athletic El Elche confirma que Etxeita regresa al Athletic (Elche confirms Etxeita returns to Athletic)]; Deia, 4 June 2013 {{es icon}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.elchecf.es/jugador/etxeita Elche official profile] {{es icon}} *[http://www.athletic-club.net/web/main.asp?a=1&b=1&c=1&d=0&jokalaria=1615&idi=2 Athletic Bilbao profile] *[http://www.bdfutbol.com/en/j/j8505.html BDFutbol profile] *[http://www.transfermarkt.co.uk/en/xabier-etxeita/profil/spieler_71559.html Transfermarkt profile] {{Athletic Bilbao squad}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Etxeita, Xabier | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = Etxeita, Xabi | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Spanish footballer | DATE OF BIRTH = 31 October 1987 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Zornotza, Spain | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Etxeita, Xabier}} [[Category:1987 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Biscay]] [[Category:Spanish footballers]] [[Category:Basque footballers]] [[Category:Association football defenders]] [[Category:La Liga footballers]] [[Category:Segunda División footballers]] [[Category:Segunda División B footballers]] [[Category:Tercera División footballers]] [[Category:Bilbao Athletic footballers]] [[Category:Athletic Bilbao footballers]] [[Category:FC Cartagena footballers]] [[Category:Elche CF players]]
